goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 93.1 KB)
target: By 2030, ensure access for all to adequate, safe and affordable housing and basic services and upgrade slums
title: Untitled
indicator_name: Proportion of persons living in dwellings with more than 2 persons per room (overcrowded)
national_indicator_available: 11.1.1.b. Proportion of persons living in dwellings with more than 2 persons per room (overcrowded)
computation_calculations:
1. Number of persons per room = Number of persons in the household / number of rooms in which the household lives * 100;
2. Share of persons living in dwellings with more than two persons per room = Number of persons living in dwellings with more than two persons per room out of the total number of population * 100.
Note: Since 2014, the number of population with usual residence was used for estimating the indicator.
graph_title: 11.1.1.b. Proportion of persons living in dwellings with more than 2 persons per room (overcrowded)
comparison_global: The national indicator is one of the many indicators which are suggested for calculating the aggregated indicator at the global level
